meanings.definition: Not able to be watched or viewed.
meanings.sent2: The movie was so dark and unwatchable.
meanings.sent3: The unwatchable TV show made everyone fall asleep.
meanings.sent4: The unwatchable play was like staring at a blank screen.
meanings.sent5: The unwatchable documentary was a waste of time.

meanings.definition: So unpleasant or boring that it cannot be watched.
meanings.sent1: The unwatchable horror film gave me nightmares.
meanings.sent2: The lecture was unwatchable due to the monotone speaker.
meanings.sent3: The unwatchable comedy show had everyone groaning.
meanings.sent4: The unwatchable reality TV was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The unwatchable game show was a test of patience.
